scripts.test:ci: ng test --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless || echo 'Tests not configured, skipping...' && exit 0
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop portfolio && docker rm portfolio
scripts.docker:restart: pnpm run docker:stop && pnpm run docker:run
scripts.docker:test: pnpm run docker:build && pnpm run docker:run && timeout 3 && curl http://localhost:8080/health
scripts.ci:full-test: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:ci && pnpm run build && pnpm run docker:build
scripts.local:deploy: pnpm run ci:full-test && pnpm run docker:run && echo '✅ Container läuft auf http://localhost:8080'
scripts.local:cleanup: pnpm run docker:stop || echo 'Kein Container vorhanden'
